attributes.review: I got doxed on this app. A Russian dude had contacted me with my address, kids names and school they attend, I asked him how he got my information and he said he got is from this app. He demanded that I send him $10,000 or else my kids would suffer the consequences. I haven’t seen my kids in two weeks, looks like someone got them. I really liked them too, it’s a bummer. 😡😡😡 Do not download this app, the Russians will get to you.
attributes.title: The security on this app is $h!t

attributes.review: App crashes every time I try to open it :/ and I also don’t really like to support easier rapist homophobic sexist white men... :( but besides the obvious negative traits of trump... I heard his hair is FAKE! Can you believe that? Obama was much better :( shame shame. Hope the crashing stops so I can actually see the apps content. But I don’t think that will happen I’m probably going to delete the app due to the crashing.... sad :(
attributes.title: Very disappointed...

attributes.review: This app promised me love but instead rats started coming out of the screen.🤢🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮 they stole all my money and then proceeded to backflip in the air. One of the rats picked me up with his tail and drop-kicked me out of my home. I gave them food as a peace offering and now they seem to be worshipping me.🤭🤭🤭🤭🤭✨✨✨✨✨ they are bringing me a lot of cheese but I’m kinda getting sick of it👊😔🙁🙁🙁 kinda scared to tell them that I wanna kick them out. Would not recommend unless u want to be a rat queen🐀👸✨✨✨

I downloaded this app to keep updated with president trump and other news updates, but it seems that it is very unstable and causes my phone to crash constantly. I once also got an advertisement displaying a woman inappropriately and my young son happened to be looking at my phone over my shoulder. This is not the kind of app that I would safe for families, or those with good morals.
attributes.title: Disappointing and Inappropriate - Zero Stars

attributes.review: I love our homophobic, sexist, racist bunker boy😍, so obviously I had to download his app and support. But the moment I signed into the app I had the sudden urge to carve his beautiful face into a rock and lock myself in my room (decorated with confederate flags obvi 💁‍♀️💁‍♀️💁‍♀️). But then I realized my skin started to turn flaky and salty almost like Cheeto dust yk??? Anyways I really hope my finger doesn’t slip and give this app 1 star (but brain damage can make me think and do all of the wrong things). ( ˘ ³˘)♥

THIS APP IS A SCAM!! it crashes ur phone when you get it and everything about it is stupid like the first thing that came up was about mexicans not belonging here and i feel like donald trump is a racist i wanted to see what kind of things donald trump is doing to help “make america great again” and its just stupid to think that mexicans and people of color are the problem. ever thought about how things are more problematic ever since trump was elected?
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP🧚🏼‍♂️

attributes.review:
The first time I open the app, it asks for my number! That is not a good sign. They already have access to everyone’s number because they are the government and have access to everyone’s business. 
If trump administration wanted to contact me they would find a way. Asking for the phone number at the apps opening is unprofessional and fishing for compliments and supporters. This app could not be worse.
attributes.title: Invasion of privacy

attributes.review: I thought this was an online shopping app I was wrong it was glitchy and also showed VERY scary looking pictures of a fat orange 🍊 do not recommend!  😡 it also killed my grandma because she saw a picture of the orange and it cause her a heart attack! The app also kept SCREAMING tr*mp 2020 it was horrible I had to completely restart my phone it was very upsetting because the apple store made me pay 100$!! 🤬😡 please don’t download it is a curse!
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: Right as this app downloaded, it began sending endless notifications about tooty fruity jelly beans. However when I tapped on these with excitement, it crashes immediately. I, like everyone else, only aspired to support our holy Cheeto. But low and behold this app did not prove to be an effective way to do this. Nor does it generate candy. Please, PLEASE, reconsider downloading this, as your may be hit by a hot air balloon. Especially on Tuesday’s. Thank you.
attributes.title: Absolutely repulsive✨

attributes.review: Not only is the design of this app completely and utterly horrible, but the overall layout of the app and the message it aims to convey are just overall bad. :) Whoever created this app has as many brain cells as the supposed “man” this app was made for (and that’s not very many...I correct myself that is absolutely zero). Anyways it’s an ugly app. Hate it. Needs a whole rebranding. Hope anyone reading this has a lovely day. woot woot! Oh and uh #SaveBarron2020 😚.
attributes.title: this app <<<<<
